content:
本件保存
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
MC- 3845
*
Mr. C. C. Chang Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
MAY 25 1962
Dear Mr. Chang:
Excess Property Acquisition from Sources in Taiwan for the Broadcasting Corporation of China
This is to inform you that following inspection by BCC engineers at the Bureau of Engineering Service (BES) yard, the following generators which have been lying in the yard for many months are found to be useful for BCC.
(1) Generator Set, DED 15 KW, AC, 120/208, 240/416 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle, Serial No. R-12059, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 444.00
(2) Generator Set, DED 30 KW, AC, 120 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle Serial No. 34B493687, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 493.00
(3) Generator Set, DED 15 KW, AC, 120/208, 240/416 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle, Serial No. 63, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 444.00
We understand the above generators were originally procured for the Taiwan Power Company, and for some reasons they are not required by TPC now.
We therefore recommend that these generators be given to BCC in accordance with Mission letter MC-3665 dated May 15, 1962 to Mr. K. T. Li re FY62 Project 484-96-001 Communications Media - BCC Sub-project.
51.5. 25
10382
V.O.
S.Q.
2
CUSA
hus
3 22 記 BCC SE 1 こっま5/25 + 4
Sincerely yours, Ralph L. Harwood Ralph L. Harwood Communications Media Officer
國史饭 Academia Historica
321

paragraphs.content: 本件保存
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
Mr. C. C. Chang Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Dear Mr. Chang:
Excess Property Acquisition from Sources in Taiwan for the Broadcasting Corporation of China

This is to inform you that following inspection by BCC engineers at the Bureau of Engineering Service (BES) yard, the following generators which have been lying in the yard for many months are found to be useful for BCC.
(1) Generator Set, DED 15 KW, AC, 120/208, 240/416 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle, Serial No. R-12059, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 444.00
(2) Generator Set, DED 30 KW, AC, 120 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle Serial No. 34B493687, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 493.00
(3) Generator Set, DED 15 KW, AC, 120/208, 240/416 V, 3 phase, 60 cycle, Serial No. 63, 1 pc. R-1 condition A.C. US$2, 444.00
We understand the above generators were originally procured for the Taiwan Power Company, and for some reasons they are not required by TPC now.

We therefore recommend that these generators be given to BCC in accordance with Mission letter MC-3665 dated May 15, 1962 to Mr. K. T. Li re FY62 Project 484-96-001 Communications Media - BCC Sub-project.
V.O.
S.Q.
CUSA
